messages.msgSnippet: For those who are interested just uploaded a couple hundred more photos to the site; www.toryu-mon.com If you are so inclined please take a look and please
messages.messageBody:
For those who are interested just uploaded a couple hundred more
photos to the site;
www.toryu-mon.com
If you are so inclined please take a look and please feel free to
comment...
-t
Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil

----- Original Message -----
From: Tom Helm
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com ; nihonto@yahoogroups.com
Sent: 06/20/2011 2:19 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Web-sighted



All -
Just spent the weekend scanning a bunch of old photos into the
computer, these may be seen on my website www.toryu-mon.com under
Galleries. Actually found more old photos while I was at it so in
another week will be uploading those. Please take the time to visit
the site and send me any feedback you may have on the articles I have
posted as well.
Thank you,
-tch
Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil

messages.subject: Web-sighted
messages.msgSnippet: All - Just spent the weekend scanning a bunch of old photos into the computer, these may be seen on my website www.toryu-mon.com under Galleries. Actually
messages.messageBody:
All -
Just spent the weekend scanning a bunch of old photos into the
computer, these may be seen on my website www.toryu-mon.com under
Galleries. Actually found more old photos while I was at it so in
another week will be uploading those. Please take the time to visit
the site and send me any feedback you may have on the articles I have
posted as well.
Thank you,
-tch
Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil
